title: What champion for a 1v5 match?
body:
Hey, I was just wondering what champion would be best for a 1v5 match. There are specific rules for this 1v5 though.

- Summoners Rift 1v5
- Recalls allowed
- Once dead, the player cannot return to lane.
If the one dies, the five win. If the five all die at least once, the one wins.
- Turret and minion kills don't matter
- Mid lane only; no smite

Thanks, Ehrny.

replies.body: id say morg if theyre worse skill, long range mage if same skill
personally, anivia wouldnt be the worst, good quick burst with a revive ability and a way to trap them under tower if they get cocky, as well as a good slow and a stun

champions with high AoE damage abilities would probably be the best, champs such as {{champion:92}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:268}} would one of the best. but like that's only coming from a B5 player (me) so that's the best info I can give :){{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Can i just imply that there is a reason why champs aren't meant to be 1v5 champs... It would be so unbalanced and highly broken. Sure there are champs better at fighting groups due to crowd control and things but there isn't a specific champ that will be best at 1v5ing IMO. if i were to have a crack at it, i'd say darius is your best bet.
